tags.name: -split-view
tags.description: A lightweight split-view web component that displays two panels (primary = first child, secondary = second child) with an optional resizable divider. Orientation and order via host classes: .vertical, .reverse.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: ARIA label for the resizer handle.

slots.name: default
slots.description: Provide exactly two elements. The first is primary, the second is secondary.
